name: SuperBurp
0:
”Alexa, open Super Burp”
”Alexa, ask Super Burp for a smelly burp”
”Alexa, ask Super Burp for a beer burp”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: super burp
des:
Beer burps, food burps, loud burps, stinky burps, gross burps and real honkers - we got 'em all, just ask!

This skill will teach you about the different kinds of burp that are out there.

No really.

Take a burping tour, or ask for specific types of burp - we'll show you something new and educate you in the ways of a true burp-master!

If you like our free content, there is even more to discover with premium content available to purchase for the discerning burper.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
